title: Amazing Corporate Suites for Extended Stay Business Travellers
posting_body: ['Tara Bridge Apartments', '1 Magnolia Circle Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Pricing:', '$1351/Month*', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Footage:', '700 sq ft', 'show contact info', Trash Compactor', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'About the community:', 'Tara Bridge Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy a game of tennis on the tennis court.', 'A spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking is available.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled amongst canopies of trees and other natural surroundings.', 'This home features large living and bedroom spaces with loads of natural light.', 'Amenities at our property:', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Courtyard', '● Fitness Center', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Maintenance on site', '● Playground', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Public Transportation', '● Close to I-75 / Easy Access to Hartsfield Airport,Military Bases & Shopping', '● Controlled Building Access', '● Gorgeous Pool', '● Online Services', '● On-Site Professional Staff', '● Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills', 'Additional information:', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally managed by
